results.title: Tron
results.brief_description: Tron is a futuristic adventure made by the Disney Studios. It is about a whizkid computer programmer trapped inside a computer world where he is pitted against electronic foes. Features some impressive computer-generated animation.

results.title: Trombone and tuba
results.creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Milton Ingerson
results.brief_description:
Episode number 9 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and music lover. Professional musicians show how the trombone and the tuba are played, demonstrate their range and tone and how to care for them.

results.title: Troll in Central Park
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, Don Bluth Productions, Don Bluth, Gary Goldman and John Pomeroy
results.brief_description: Stanley is not your usual troll because he has a kind heart and a wonderful magical gift. His “green thumb” can create flowers at a touch. Wicked Queen Gnorga of the Trolls sends Stanley to New York where there is little green growing. He takes refuge in Central Park where he befriends Gus and Rosie. Unfortunately for the trio Queen Gnorga decides to spoil their fun and lets her mischief magic wreak havoc in the Big Apple. With the voices of Dom DeLuise, Cloris Leachman and Hayley Mills.

results.title: Trojan warrior
results.creator_credit: Triple Three Films, Murray Sestak, David Teitelbaum and Salik Silverstein
results.brief_description: Featuring Stan “The Man” Longindis (eight times World Heavyweight Kickboxing Champion) “Trojan Warrior” is a comedy action film. Stan plays “Ajax” the good guy who was wronged by police when he was an undercover operative trying to infiltrate the business dealings of local gangsters. His horny cousin, Theo, is wanted by the whole of Melbourne’s underworld and its up to the ‘one-man army’ Ajax to keep him safe. The bad guys want to prevent Theo from testifying at a trial that would put them away for a very long time. Set in Melbourne with some cameo appearances by local identities and with a rocking soundtrack, “Trojan Warrior” is full of fighting, fornicating, farting and farce. Cast includes: John Brumpton, Arthur Angel, Mark ‘Jacko’ Jackson, Henry Maas.

results.title: Trois Milliards Sans Ascenseur
results.creator_credit: Andre Cohen, Marcel Sebaoun, Eugene Lepicier and Roger Pigaut
results.brief_description:
Five friends living in a blue-collar neighborhood which is being demolished to make way for a new office and housing development band together to save their neighborhood and get rich along the way. They set up on a complicated plot involving both jewel theft and insurance fraud. Things get even more complicated when they call for the services of an expert burglar.

Credits: Producers, Andre Cohen, Marcel Sebaoun, Eugene Lepicier ; director, Roger Pigaut ; writers, Roger Pigaut, Andre G. Brunelin ; photography, Jean Tournier ; music, Teo Usuelli.
Cast: Serge Reggiani, Michel Bouquet, Francoise Rosay, Bernard Fresson, Dany Carrel, Amidou, Gabriele Ferzetti, Marcel Bozzuffi, Victor Lanoux, Nike Arrighi.

results.title: Trois Chambres a Manhattan = Three Rooms in Manhattan
results.brief_description:
Francois and Kay meet in a bar in New York. She is a former countess, he is an actor. Both of them must reconcile with their past while they decide to trust their feelings and possibly enter into a relationship.

Credits: Producer, Charles Lumbroso ; director, Marcel Carne ; writer, Jacques Sigurd ; photography, Eugen Schuftan ; music, Mal Waldron, Martial Solal.
Cast: Annie Girardot, Maurice Ronet, Roland Lesaffre, Otto E. Hasse, Genevieve Page, Gabriele Ferzetti.

results.title: Troilus and Cressida (BBC)
results.creator_credit: BBC-TV, Time-Life Films and Jonathan Miller
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “BBC Television Shakespeare Series”.
BBC adaptation of Shakespeare’s ‘Troilus and Cressida’, without doubt his most shockingly modern play. The Trojan war has been raging for seven years. Few care any more about its first cause, the abduction of Helen. Each side is consumed by its own in-fighting - in saving face and destroying others. What keeps them there is their love of honour and of violence. A tragically mismanaged sideshow to this squalid war, the love of Troilus and Cressida, becomes a pattern for all relationships destroyed by circumstance, misunderstanding and deceit. Cast includes Charles Gray, Anton Lesser, Tony Steedman and Suzanne Burden.

results.title: Trobriand cricket
results.brief_description: A fascinating ethnographic documentary about cultural creativity among the people of the Trobriand Islands. The film shows how the islanders have adapted the game of cricket - first introduced by Methodist missionaries - into an outlet for mock warfare and inter-village competition, chanting and an expression of the islanders’ experience of colonialism.

results.title: Triumph of the will. - [Short version]
results.brief_description: Triumph of the will is the official film record of the Sixth Nazi Party Congress (Nationalsozialistische Deutsche Arbeiter-Partei. Reichsparteitag) held at Nuremberg, Germany, September 4 to 10, 1934. It was created by Leni Riefenstahl at the order of Hitler. The purpose of the film was propagandistic, and as propaganda, it is an historical landmark which may never be equalled. It is also a visually beautiful film - showing the supreme pageantry of the Congress and capturing the enthusiasm of the huge crowds (men, women and children of all ages) who took part. This version is rather disjointed owing to the editing of the original version which ran for over two hours. As an example of German filmmaking of the period, it is unequalled. The various parades and ceremonies are shown and many of the leaders of the Party who later became so well known are seen. Hitler is also shown giving some of his speeches which receive a startling reception. German dialogue with some English subtitles.
